# barcodes

**Instance Property**

The machine-readable codes found within the container.

## Declaration

```swift
var barcodes: [BarcodeObservation] { get }
```

## Discussion

Vision recognizes 20 different barcode types; to see the specific codes you can use [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/RecognizeDocumentsRequest/supportedBarcodeSymbologies]. To see this value, set [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/RecognizeDocumentsRequest/BarcodeDetectionOptions-swift.struct/enabled] within [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/RecognizeDocumentsRequest/BarcodeDetectionOptions-swift.struct] to `true`.

## Accessing specific content within a document

- **DocumentObservation.Container.DataDetectorMatch**: Detected content in the document matched to a specific type of data, such as emails, phone numbers, addresses, and so on.
- **lists**: The lists found within the container.
- **paragraphs**: The document’s extracted text, grouped into paragraphs within the container.
- **tables**: The tables found within the container.
- **text**: All the text found within the container.
- **title**: The title found within the container.
